allShows.title: Ben 10
allShows.description: A young boy uses a mysterious watch to transform into alien heroes and save the world from evil threats.

allShows.title: Chhota Bheem
allShows.description: Bheem, a brave and strong boy from Dholakpur, takes on villains and saves the day using wisdom and strength.

allShows.title: Courage: The Cowardly Dog
allShows.description: A timid dog named Courage fights supernatural forces to protect his owners in the middle of Nowhere.

allShows.title: Doraemon
allShows.description: A robotic cat from the future helps Nobita tackle everyday problems with futuristic gadgets.

allShows.title: Kid vs Kat
allShows.description: When Coop's little sister adopts a mysterious hairless cat, he discovers it's actually an evil alien, and a battle of wits begins.

allShows.title: Kiteretsu
allShows.description: A genius boy invents amazing gadgets with his robot friend Korosuke.

allShows.title: Mr. Bean
allShows.description: The eccentric and childlike Mr. Bean turns everyday tasks into hilarious challenges with minimal dialogue.

allShows.title: Ninja Hattori
allShows.description: A skilled ninja boy helps Kenichi navigate school and life, while fighting evil ninjas.

allShows.title: Oggy and the Cockroaches
allShows.description: Oggy the cat battles three mischievous cockroaches in a never-ending war of slapstick comedy.

allShows.title: Oswald
allShows.description: A gentle octopus named Oswald teaches kindness, patience, and friendship through his daily life.

allShows.title: Perman
allShows.description: Mitsuo transforms into Perman to fight crime, save people, and live a double life as a student.

allShows.title: Phineas and Ferb
allShows.description: Stepbrothers Phineas and Ferb invent wild projects while their sister tries to bust them and their pet platypus fights evil.

allShows.title: Pokemon
allShows.description: Follow Ash and Pikachu on their journey to become Pok√©mon Masters while battling rivals and discovering new species.

allShows.title: Roll No 21
allShows.description: Kris, an avatar of Lord Krishna, defeats evil with clever tactics in the modern-day school setting.

allShows.title: Shinchan
allShows.description: A mischievous 5-year-old boy causes chaos at home and school with his unpredictable antics.

allShows.title: SpongeBob Square Pants
allShows.description: In the underwater city of Bikini Bottom, SpongeBob and his quirky friends embark on hilarious and absurd adventures.

allShows.title: Strawberry Shortcake
allShows.description: Strawberry Shortcake and her friends go on sweet adventures filled with fun, friendship, and positivity in their colorful world.

allShows.title: Tom and Jerry
allShows.description: A classic rivalry between cat and mouse with endless comic chases and slapstick moments.
